page.title: 04PEOPLE AT THE SCHOOL Cont.
page.content:
A TEACHER Cont. but she does not like marking books.
Mrs ELLISON. Mrs Ellison is the Broughton First School's cook.She cooks the dinners for the children. She gets to school at half past eight. Mrs Ellison likes cheese flan and chicken pie best.
OUR WELFARE ASSISTANT Mrs McPherson is the welfare assistant at Broughton First School. She wakes up at seven o'clock every morning.She likes painting and drawing best.Her favourite colours are blue in summer and brown in winter. She does not like washingup.
Mrs MOONEY. She teaches in room two, and she is the deputy head teacher.
